mapper.select: SELECT * FROM class_table ORDER BY class_id DESC

select count(*) from class_table
where class_id > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class_table(class_id, class_img, class_name, class_content, class_peopleno) VALUES (class_id_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{class_img}, #{class_name}, #{class_content}, #{class_peopleno})
mapper.update: UPDATE class_table SET class_name = #{class_name}, class_img = #{class_img}, class_content = #{class_content}, class_peopleno = #{class_peopleno}, update_date = sysdate WHERE class_id = #{class_id}
update class_table set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where class_id = #{class_id}
